Package cz.vutbr.fit.layout.cssbox.impl

Class CSSBoxTreeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vutbr.fit.layout.impl.BaseBoxTreeBuilder
      • cz.vutbr.fit.layout.cssbox.impl.CSSBoxTreeBuilder
  • public class CSSBoxTreeBuilder
extends BaseBoxTreeBuilder
    This class implements building the box tree using the CSSBox rendering engine.
    Author:
    burgetr
